    • add

      public void add(E e)
      Adds a new ListNode to the list at the position of the iterator between this iterator's next and previous elements. After the addition, the next field stays the same, previous become the new element. LastRetrieved is set to null.
      Specified by:
      add in interface ListIterator<E>
      Parameters:
      e - The data to give the new node.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if the given data is null.
